sentences.sContent: Students who achieve an acceptable standard will progress to degree studies.
sentences.sCn: 达到一定程度的学生可以进一步攻读学位。

sentences.sContent: How do we reach an acceptable level of data security?
sentences.sCn: 我们如何使数据安全达到令人满意的程度？
